Getting Started

Getting Started

This guide will help you get started with our product. Follow these steps to set up and start using it effectively.

Prerequisites

Before you begin, ensure you have the following:

  • Node.js (version 14 or later)
  • npm or yarn package manager
  • Basic knowledge of JavaScript

Installation

You can install our product using npm:

npm install example-product

Or using yarn:

yarn add example-product

Configuration

Create a configuration file named example.config.js in your project root:


module.exports = {
  apiKey: 'your-api-key',
  environment: 'production',
  debug: false,
  timeout: 30000
};

Basic Usage

Here's how to use our product in your application:


import { Example } from 'example-product';
import config from './example.config.js';

// Initialize with configuration
const example = new Example(config);

// Start the service
example.start()
  .then(result => {
    console.log('Service started successfully:', result);
  })
  .catch(error => {
    console.error('Failed to start service:', error);
  });

Next Steps

After getting started, you may want to explore:

  • API Reference - Detailed API documentation
  • Examples - Common usage examples
  • Advanced Topics - Advanced features and configurations
